afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.grower

Class AERTGrower<R extends java.io.Serializable,O extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.erts.grower.AERTGrower<R,O,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type of attributes contained in the Extra Trees.
    O - Type of object attached to the points.
    C - Type of content present in the leafs of the Extra Trees.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationERTGrower, RegressionERTGrower

    public abstract class AERTGrower<R extends java.io.Serializable,O extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class used to grow Extra Trees.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getK()
      Return "k" the number of random features selected at each split.
      int getNmin()
      Return "nMin" (a split is performed if more than nMin points are present and not all labels are the same).
      IERTScore<R,O> getScoringFunction()
      Return the scoring function used for the training of the extremely randomized trees.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AERTGrower

        public AERTGrower(java.lang.Integer k,
          int nMin,
          IERTScore<R,O> score)
        Creates a ERTGrower that will create ExtraTrees according to the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        k - number of splits to create at each inner node. If k is null, then sqrt(number of attribute) will be used.
        nMin - a leaf is created if |set| <= n_min.
        score - score object used to calculate split scores.

    • Method Detail

      • growERT

        public <T extends ITrainingPoint<R,O>> DecisionTree<R,C> growERT(java.util.Collection<T> set)
        Return an extra tree created from the set of points.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of ITrainingPoints used by the Extra Trees.
        Parameters:
        set - set of points to create the tree from.
        Returns:
        an extra tree created from the set of points.

      • growForest

                                                     int numberOfTrees)
        Return a forest of containing numberOfTrees.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of ITrainingPoints used by the Extra Trees.
        Parameters:
        set - set of points to create the forest from.
        numberOfTrees - number of trees to create in the forest.
        Returns:
        a forest of containing numberOfTrees.
